features: 【Nonstick Cookware】:Our Nonstick Frying Pan Set includes: 3-piece 8 inch/9.5-Inch/11-inch fry pans, nonstick performance makes food release easy and allows for healthy cooking.

【Sturdy Aluminum Construction】: Made of high-grade aluminum with excellent heat conduction and even heating, our kitchen cookware are designed for durability and scratch resistant corrosion and warping.
【Effortless Cleanup】: Aluminum body with non-stick coating frying pan prevents food from sticking and makes cleanup effortless.
【Stay-Cool Handle】Riveted handle stays cool and is ergonomically designed for comfort.

【Works on Most Stovetops】: Non-Stick basic fry pan works on gas, electric, glass, halogen, ceramic, etc, suitable for major kinds of stovetops. Not induction compatible. Dishwasher safe. Oven-safe up to 350°F.
body.description: The Cook N Home Nonstick Saute Skillet Fry Pan 3-Piece Set, 8 inch/9.5-Inch/11-inch, Black is made of thick gauge aluminum that provides even and quick heat conduction and prevents hot spots. Nonstick makes food release, cleaning, flipping, and tossing easy and allows for healthy cooking. Long riveted handle with hole for hanging is comfortable to hold, stays cool, and non-slip; Flat, wide, and thick bottom for a large cooking surface, is multipurpose, and keeps temperature. Flared sides for pouring, stirring, and sliding food out. Not induction compatible. Oven-safe up to 350°F. Works on: gas, electric, glass, halogen, ceramic, glass etc. Dishwasher safe.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect! Would buy again!
reviews.reviewText: These are wonderful. Lightweight, nonstick and great sizes.Have worn out several Tfal and was skeptical but I like these more. The cost is much better and the design is better, they just feel good using them.Even temperature across them, start medium heat and they heat quickly and evenly, no need for high.Tfal skillets sides tend to gently flair out from top to bottom. The sides on these are straight up and down so less splatter.I don't put them in the dishwasher but they are so easy to clean they are fine hand washing.Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I really like them. Great quality. Thank you

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars If you're reading - buy it
reviews.reviewText: Fantastic VALUE! Bought these to use in a roommate situation. These have held up after almost 2 years of constant use (Mostly large pan and large pot). Because the lid is shared between the large pot and large pan, the lid handle detached after a year. I tried to put it back as it was, but could not. I ended up removing the rubber sleeve and screwed the bare screw directly against the glass lid. I'm sure I could buy a Calphalon or some other brand lid for this set, and it would be perfect. The set heats mostly even, works flawless for the many dishes I make.I use the accompanying solid spoon for most everything, it looks worn, but it is to be expected. The plastic isn't thick, but it has done everything I've asked of it.This set is everything you need if you're looking for a.) Affordable cookware b.) Community cookware that may get mistreated. (The only damage is from roommates using metal forks to stir/mix)I highly recommend this for young adults. If you're looking for better value, I don't know where you may find it, for as inexpensive as this set is, why take risk of saving a few dollars on a worse, less trusted product? This is a STARTER set with everything you need.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2012
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Excellent set for smaller amounts of food
reviews.reviewText: The nonstick coating is fantastic - incredibly easy to cook and clean with. The rubberized handles are very comfortable. If you're cooking for yourself or maybe one other person, the pots and pans are perfect.However, I do suggest that if you regularly cook for multiple people and you buy this set, get an extra, larger frying pan. The larger of the two that's provided is not really adequate if, say, you're sauteing two whole onions for a full pot of soup, or if you want to make a quesadilla using large tortillas. Because I mostly cook multiple meals' worth of food at a time, I don't use either of the frying pans in the set all that often. I also never find a use for the smallest saucepan.I've also found that the utensils are of somewhat questionable quality. In particular, they don't react too well to heat. I'm not sure if it's from normal use or from one of my roommates frequently leaving it resting on a hot frying pan, but the end of the spatula has some damage from melting or burning, which causes small strips of black plastic to fall off occasionally. And there are several deep gouges in the handle caused by letting it rest on the edge of a hot pan and melting.But the bottom line is that this is a very nice cookware set at a pretty good price. Maybe buy a bigger frying pan and a better spatula to supplement it, and that will basically fix the minor problems it has.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought these as a gift. They came well boxed and seem to be very nice for the price. So I would recommend this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good basic cookware set
reviews.reviewText: Basic pots and pans with anti-stick surfaces, able to be used in the oven and cleaned in the dishwasher. Good size selection for single, couple or whole family - great selection that doesn't need a lot of storage space.The non-stick coating may not last long but has held up well for the first few months. For the price, you can't go wrong with this set.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Rather spend a little bit more of money than buying these cheap ones

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 10, 2014
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good, Cheap set
reviews.reviewText: UPDATE: (04/28/2014)So I am taking away two stars because of something that bothers me with this product. The lid is very, very tough to clean. See, there is a metal ring that holds the glass of the lid but food gets stuck between the small gap of the glass and metal. You can hold up the lid and see tomato sauce and oil and other crud in the small gap. And trying to clean it out is pretty much impossible. Spent over a half hour on one lid and wasn't able to get any of it out, seems really stuck in there.---- Original Review:We bought these as a cheap set for our new apartment and in general we are pretty happy so far. It has only been a couple weeks though, so can't comment too much on longevity. But in terms of cooking and cleaning, they worked well enough without any complaints. The sizes are okay, may be on the small side for more than two or three people though. But for a couple or for college, these are a good set to pick up. They do seem to be easier to clean than stainless steel pots and pans (the pots seem to be non-stick too, which I never cooked with before).The only thing I noticed so far is that the handle gets a bit hot and it is made of rubber or some such and I worry about it starting to degrade. Haven't noticed anything yet, but something that I'm keeping an eye on.
Pleased with the cookware. Well built, attractive, and nonstick cookware. Nonstick application looks good. Too early to tell as for durability. Good value.

reviews.reviewTitle: Your money has value with this!
reviews.reviewText: Its been about a year now, forgot food on d stove and it didn't burn up d pot, very few parts of d food got wasted and d pot just cleaned right off as if I didn't do anything, no scratch no sSticks no spoilage. (TOnly try to manage the pot, it's glass handles and don't use metal utensils to scratch the pot, it'll destroy d non stick layer) this pot is overall amazing. also note that this pot sets can prepare meals for and average of 2-3persons.

La verdad solo puedo escribir en la reseña... Mi esposa quedó encantada!No puedo poner experiencia de uso, porque no los uso, pero al ver a mi esposa, noto que le encantaron la cantidad y calidad de ollas y sartenes. Los cucharones que vienen no son de alta calidad, pero se ven bien y muy útiles para la cocina.Gran compra, barata, excelente calidad y muy útiles cada uno de los elementos que vienen en el paquete.

The media could not be loaded. La compré en septiembre del 2021, y hasta la fecha está en muy buen estado, obviamente le hemos dado un buen trato, como por ejemplo, siempre lavándola con detergente líquido y no con jabón en polvo que es más agresivo. Así como, usando los utensilios que trae, o de madera para no maltratar el teflón. Lo negativo, pero que me tiene sin problema, es que, desde un principio se mancha por el calor en la parte de abajo y otro detalle, el sartén grande, la agarradera de estar fija, ahora se mueve, pero se ha mantenido en su lugar. Sin duda, la recomiendo, porque es económica y duradera.
